name: 玄德
content: <procedureTrigger class="irreplacable"><tickingTimeLimit class="irreplacable"><tickingLimit class="irreplacable"><preparingStage></preparingStage></tickingLimit></tickingLimit></procedureTrigger>，<you></you><draw><drawHead></drawHead><equaling><equalingHead></equalingHead>已失去体力值一半(向上取整)</equaling>的<drawEnd></drawEnd></draw>。

role.lore: 濬哲文明，溫恭允塞，玄德升聞

name: 允中
content: <procedureTrigger class="irreplacable"><tickingTimeLimit class="irreplacable"><tickingLimit class="irreplacable"><actingStage></actingStage></tickingLimit><numberLimit class="irreplacable"><numberLimiting><numberLimitingHead></numberLimitingHead>一<numberLimitingEnd></numberLimitingEnd></numberLimiting></numberLimit></tickingLimit></procedureTrigger>，<you></you><can><canHead></canHead><or><make><makeHead></makeHead><roleSelector class="irreplacable"><targetNumberLimit class="irreplacable">所有</targetNumberLimit><targetLimit class="irreplacable"><handCard></handCard>最多的<roleDefault></roleDefault></targetLimit></roleSelector><each><eachHead></eachHead><discard><discardBody1></discardBody1></discard><selector class="irreplacable"><targetNumberLimit class="irreplacable">一张</targetNumberLimit><cardDefault></cardDefault></selector></each></make><orBody></orBody><make><makeHead></makeHead><roleSelector class="irreplacable"><targetNumberLimit class="irreplacable">所有</targetNumberLimit><targetLimit class="irreplacable"><handCard></handCard>最少的<roleDefault></roleDefault></targetLimit></roleSelector><each><eachHead></eachHead><draw><drawHead></drawHead>一张<drawEnd></drawEnd></draw></each></make></or></can>。
